overview:
Present in over 35 countries, with more than 60 professionals and with over 17 exclusive partnerships, Be Spotted is the first International Network for Advertising in Software located in Florida, USA.

Their patent pending solution for inserting Digital ads into Desktop Softwareâ€™s gives developers the option to monetize on their products by showing targeted and controlled advertisement.

Basically what they do is supply developers with a unique code that connects to the Be Spotted network and via this network they connect to a Global advertising market: Exchange platforms, Ad Networks, Agencies, etcâ€¦

Many developers, especially developers of Free products, will welcome this novel solution for it’s stability and for it’s purpose of providing a New revenue source.

Be Spotted is also offering a unique opportunity for itâ€™s partners â€“ Developers. They are offering a free advertising channel inside their network that will serve Developers as a Promotional tool.

This new solution is also supplying developers with data relevant to their further development. Statistics on: Application usage, Application run time, Geo location of users and other statistics are available to all Be Spotted partners.

Be Spotted is working with software partners, such as Lexis Nexis - a high class secure software used by the United States Government and Commercial software’s such as Easy Photo Uploader, showing how secure, flexible and versatile their solution is.

Partners such as Advertising networks, Advertising agencies and Direct clients are already benefiting from this untapped inventory by offering it exclusively and by engaging a new, targeted and focused channel where the Global reach is above 2 Billion daily users.

Developers are hungry for monetization, Advertisers are looking for new opportunities and it looks like Be Spotted holds the key to this next advertising boom.
